markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 632 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

A healing effect restores a creature's body, typically by restoring Hit Points, but sometimes by removing [diseases](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) or other debilitating effects.
name: Healing
